Sponsorships

The Sponsorship section provides an overview of our Global Sponsorship Strategy along with a summary of our Sponsorship properties. Additionally, this section offers a behind the scenes look at sponsorship and marketing teams on the ground and our Team Visa athletes.

  • Strategy
  • Top 5
  • Team Visa
  • Properties

In this section we will feature one of our Team Visa athletes each month.

  • Q/A
  • Global Team Visa Athlete Roster

Pavel Datsyuk

Russia
Ice Hockey

Q. What are you most looking forward to in Russia?

A. Returning home to my motherland to play for my county in the most prestigious event.

Q. What is your favorite book?

A. The Monk who sold his Ferrari by Robin Sharma.

Q. What is your favorite vacation spot?

A. Maldives Islands.

Q. Describe your perfect sandwich.

A. Toast with peanut butter, and white bread with butter and black caviar.

Q. If you had/have a charity, what would/does it support?

A. Cancer and children who lost parents.

Q. What languages do you speak?

A. Russian and English.

Q. You have five minutes to pack up and leave your home. What three items do you bring with you?

A. Visa credit card, a book to read, passport.

Q. What did you get in trouble for most often when you were younger?

A. For playing outdoor sports instead of school homework.

Q. Facebook or Twitter?

A. Twitter.

Q. Spender or Saver?

A. Saver.
